Hi Nansi,

Hope you had a good weekend.

Just standing by for confirmation on this - our team is ready to get to work.
This ticket has been waiting for over 24 hours.

Hey Nancy,

Thank you for these - just confirming that we should:

1. Fix text - 'Please fill out the form'
2. Try and reduce white space if we can
3. Fix - Note: Overweight charges may apply
4. Remove dot
5. On the confirmation screen, remove 'Last step, please provide your details'.

Thanks,
Andy

Hi Nansi,

I hope all is well.

We have updated the images measurements. Here is the before and after photos.

Hi Nansi,

  1. Dimensions - Height width and length all wrong (*Done)
  2. Instead of the yellow circle button - can it be a text box "book now" button (*Done)
  3. Can it be one click to progress to next stage rather than double click? (*Yes, the staging resources limited and with a slower response compare to live site)
  4. I'm assuming the speed is slow due to staging server? (*Yes, the staging resources limited and with a slower response compare to live site)

Mobile:

  1. The bar with the area and dates are too close together doesn't relate to the design -refer back to this link for initial design https://www.figma.com/design/KqUrH8GzeN6l2Z06G6AOZJ/Aussie-Industries---Form-Redesign?node-id=2125-2&p=f&t=4wrdAvnehNFnndrN-0 (*Done)
  2. Height width and length all wrong (*Done)
  3. Image of the bin and measurements too small (*We are manually adjusting the size of the image measurements, we will update you later today)

Hi all,

Can I please have an update on progress ?

full_threads.body:
Hi Nansi,

Just confirming we're doing some final tests on this before resharing.

On Smart Reviews, their support team is looking into.

We'll send you an update on both before the weekend.

Thank you

Hi Nansi,

Thanks for sending a feedback,

We will run through the changes and will update you asap.

Hi all,

Some feedback, please see below

Desktop:


  1. Image of the bin needs to be as large as possible to fill the space - too much white space





  1. Dimensions - Height width and length all wrong

  2. Instead of the yellow circle button - can it be a text box "book now" button

  3. Can it be one click to progress to next stage rather than double click?

  4. I'm assuming the speed is slow due to staging server?



Mobile:


  1. The bar with the area and dates are too close together doesn't relate to the design -refer back to this link for initial design https://www.figma.com/design/KqUrH8GzeN6l2Z06G6AOZJ/Aussie-Industries---Form-Redesign?node-id=2125-2&p=f&t=4wrdAvnehNFnndrN-0

  2. Height width and length all wrong

  3. Image of the bin and measurements too small
